ColumnTextComponent.Name: Fremont ES side comp
ColumnTextComponent.TextColumn:
7 Habits for Highly Effective People

Habit 1:

Be Proactive

Habit 2:

Begin with the End in Mind

Habit 3:

Put First Things First

Habit 4:

Think Win-Win

Habit 5:

Seek First to Understand, then to be Understood

Habit 6:

Synergize

Habit 7:

Sharpen the Saw

 

Click here for The Leader in Me website

Students placed at this school will be placed as a cohort and are assigned to classrooms in pairs where they will teach cooperatively with each other and the mentor teacher, where collaboration will be emphasized and additional enriching experiences will be provided.  Student teachers will be given training in SIOP, REACH, and Covey 7 Habits.  Further, student will be expected to work in the after school program in trade for preparation time during the school day and for which they will be paid.
